page.title: 18Kirkby Boys Club
page.content: In our block there is a youth club called Kirkby Boys Youth Club.It costs 5 pence to get in, except on Wednesday when it is 10 pence because they let the big inflatable mattress be used. In the youth club there are space invader machines and snooker tables and sometimes films are shown in the television room. There is a hall where the boys can play football and the girls can play netball. On Thursday evenings gym equipment is put out and everyone can do gymnastics. There is also a room for darts and a place where younger children can do drawings with one of the ladies who work there. There is a football pitch outside and all sorts of games are played there during the summer and winter.
